content:
REGISTRATION FORM


Please send your registration form and payment to:

Aileen R. Broccardo
Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine Phone: +1 949-824-1357
ICS2 Room 110 Fax:     +1 949-824-1715
Irvine, CA 92697-3425 Email:  aileen@ics.uci.edu


Registration: Early registration must be received by Wednesday, August 11, 1999.

There will be on-site registration beginning at 7:30 a.m. on August 19, 1999, space permitting.

Upon registration, a confirmation email will be sent to you. A receipt will be provided upon check-in at the workshop.

Hotel recommendations, maps, and directions are available.


Cancellation/Refund Policy:

Written cancellations received FIVE working days prior to the workshop date are subject to a $50 cancellation fee. Registrants who fail to cancel in writing at least FIVE working days prior to the workshop are liable for the entire fee.


Registration Fees:

Early Registration
(by Wed., August 11) 		Late or On-site
Registration
   $175.00    $250.00
     $50.00 - student    $100.00 - student


Payment:

  Check
      (payable to UC Regents) 		  Credit Card
      (Visa or Mastercard
      only) 		  Cash
      (at workshop site only)
